text: @Acyn @SethAbramson The US has under 5% of the world’s population but accounts for almost 30%of the Covid19 deaths worldwide.Trump’s delay,denial and totally incompetent response is why we have over 120,000 (world’s worst)Covid19 deaths&The economy is a shambles. -Trump’s fault
